metadata.name: RIFPAS
metadata.description:
Lord of the Pendants is a series of non-repeating pendants. It's a whole story inside. Every time new. The new force is omnipotence and omnipotence. Each pendant is unique and endows its owner with certain properties.

RIFPAS - pendant giving inspiration. Its enchanting splashing waves renew the spirit, filling it with purity and knowledge.
The energy of the ocean fills and gives inspiration with a wave of inspiration. And you discover a treasury of unprecedented beauty "pearls" of your being.

The gold framing the pendant breathes energy into it and revitalizes it.
--- --- --- --- ---
The Lord of the Pendants collection is a beautiful, unique combination of real paintings from Regina Rei Art's Metaverse Worlds series and contemporary art 3D creations @Maleev.ru
